name: Gross' Version FurAffinity
description: A FurAffinity style by Cooped. Updated on 2014.08.13 for Chrome Users. I sorta borked yalls install. Read the release notes for details. A theme based on Gross', Garratt's Dad's, colors, with shiny white slime, and black and blue body highlights. Activation instructions in release notes.
